data.name: King of Dragon Pass Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Music for the video game "King of Dragon Pass". Composed, performed and produced by Stan LePard. All the wind instruments were played on a Yamaha VL-1 physical modelling synthesizer, using a wind controller.
data.about_the_game: Music for the video game "King of Dragon Pass". Composed, performed and produced by Stan LePard. All the wind instruments were played on a Yamaha VL-1 physical modelling synthesizer, using a wind controller.
data.short_description: Beautiful and classic King of Dragon Pass soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 83 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 283 MB available space
